text: I had a wonderful experience at the dental clinic today! The front staff was friendly and assisted me smoothly through the registration process. The dentist, Dr Cassandra was patient, gentle, and thorough, taking the time to inquire about my jaw's medical history and conducting an X-ray to meticulously assess my teeth for any decay. She explained everything in detail, making sure I understood each step. The scaling procedure was done skillfully, and the overall visit was very pleasant. Highly recommend this clinic for anyone seeking attentive and expert dental care!

The service was good and informative. The dentist slowly went through the procedure as well as the prices for said procedures. During the procedure, the dentist did their best and kept pain and discomfort to a bare minimum.

Dr Leah Chiu attended to me today, she was extremely skillful, professional in handling my dental problem, and went the extra mile to ensure that my dental problem was resolved.

Q&M is very fortunate to have a dentist like her, and I would not hesitate to recommend her services to my other friends.

The team that attended to me was also very professional.

Front desk is very friendly. No waiting time, follow appointment schedule. Doctor and nurse are very patient, explain my teeth issue in great detail. Treatment process is fast, no pain and very professional!

Q&M Dental Clinic has truly exceeded my expectations! From the moment I stepped in, I was greeted by a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The staff were incredibly professional and attentive, making me feel comfortable throughout my entire visit. The clinic itself was immaculate, and I was impressed by the state-of-the-art equipment they used. My dentist was highly skilled and took the time to explain each procedure to me, ensuring I felt informed and at ease. Not only did they provide top-notch dental care, but they also offered excellent customer service, making scheduling appointments a breeze. I highly recommend Q&M Dental Clinic to anyone in need of dental services. They've certainly earned a loyal customer in me!
